   contain the root `toctree` directive.

About DEEG
============================================

.. image:: 2.*
   :width: 200px
   :height: 66px
   :align: center

DEEG is an open source toolkit for dealing with EEG signal. DEEG integrates the functions of data loading, data accessing, feature extraction, and model training. Users can customize their own pipeline with DEEG.
